timeline.bodyText: could you revert these diffs please? seems unnecessary changes
timeline.author: xushiyan
xushiyan

timeline.bodyText: can we change this to junit 5 APIs? also to reduce verbosity, could we static import the assertion functions?
timeline.author: xushiyan

timeline.bodyText:
looks like this.partitionPathFieldNames != null && this.partitionPathFieldNames.size() > 0 deserves to be a local boolean variable with a good name to improve readability.
Also can we avoid unnecessary this. references?
timeline.author: xushiyan

replies.bodyText: is it possible make sure partitionPathFieldNames not null so that we don't have to do null check here?
replies.author: xushiyan

timeline.message: [HUDI-1147] Modify GenericRecordFullPayloadGenerator to generate valid timestamps
